strengths: Exceptional structural completeness with comprehensive mandatory fields (100% populated)
Outstanding keyword diversity (26 keywords) spanning methodologies, cell lines, standards, and biological context
Excellent narrative depth with detailed technical descriptions of MuSIC pipeline and multimodal data integration
Comprehensive funding documentation with complete grant numbers, budget details, timeline, and 15 PIs with affiliations
Strong ethics documentation appropriate for non-human subjects research with clear Data Access Committee oversight

Excellent version control with version-specific DOIs, documented changes, and clear update roadmap through Nov 2026
Strong publication linkage with bioRxiv methodology paper and perturbation atlas paper
Exceptional FAIRness with persistent identifiers, multiple access pathways, clear license terms, and FAIRSCAPE provenance tracking
Outstanding cross-platform interlinking connecting 12 external platforms (repositories, publications, grants, tools)
All semantic validation checks passed: DOI format correct (Harvard Dataverse), grant numbers valid (NIH format), RRIDs correct (Cellosaurus), URLs valid

No detected semantic issues or consistency problems
recommendations: Continue current practices - this datasheet demonstrates exceptional quality across all evaluation dimensions
